channel.title: sage-300cloud on Stock2Shop
channel.description: Recent content in sage-300cloud on Stock2Shop

item.title: Sage 300cloud
item.description: Create orders on Sage 300 This allows Stock2Shop to create an order on Sage 300 when an order has been received from your sales channel(s). Sync Product Images When integrating with Sage 300, we can pull Images associated with the relevant Products into Stock2shop. These Images will be applied to the Products and will be added to the Webstore when the Product is synced through. Push Products We can update your Product data from Sage 300 in 3 minute intervals.
